description:
The 12th Japanese Escape Games series!!

Game system
This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).
*Point the screen with a cursor to solve riddles, and this game goes on.

Story
You're traveling down the highway. You have an accident.
You lose consciousness.

When you wake up, you find yourself trapped in an abandoned schoolhouse.
You are trapped in an abandoned schoolhouse.

There is no sign of anyone around you, but you have a bad feeling.
But you have a bad feeling about it. ......

You have to get out of here as soon as possible...
name: Japanese Escape Games The Abandoned Schoolhouse
intro: You have been in an accident and have lost consciousness. When you wake up, you find yourself trapped in an abandoned schoolhouse...
